titleStmt.title: A letter to a friend giving an account of all the treatises that have been publish'd with relation to the present persecution against the Church of Scotland
titleStmt.author: Monro, Alexander, d. 1715?
Meldrum, George, 1635?-1709.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Alexander Monro. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Attributed also to George Meldrum. cf. DNB.
